scripts.build: uglifyjs js/bundle.js -o build/bundle.min.js --comments '/^\!|^@preserve|^@cc_on|\bMIT\b|\bMPL\b|\bGPL\b|\(c\)|License|Copyright/' -c -m; uglifyjs js/app.js -o build/app.min.js -c -m; cleancss --s1 node_modules/normalize.css/normalize.css -o build/bundle.min.css; cat css/*.css | cleancss -o build/app.min.css
